GameModifier.Provides: -10% Unrest in the city this unit is in

UnitType.Backstory:
You were once Morrigan the Damned. You sealed yourself within the buried city of Calebethon, and toiled as each light went out. As the darkness crept through Calebethon there was a rising tide of screams and madness. It would be unjust to say that the citizens became as animals, because animals were never so cruel or afraid.
Eventually the darkness claimed those voices too, and the city settled to the gentle sounds of ragged breath and the drip of blood, flesh and filth. When the last light of Calebethon finally went out you could only hear echoes of your great city in the darkness. You have no memories of those last, horrible days.
When you awoke you walked through the streets of ancient Calebethon, and where you walked the long dead citizens of your city rose to follow.

When you awoke you walked through the streets of ancient Calebethon, and where you walked the long dead citizens of your city rose to follow.

UnitType.Description: Sions are the most skilled warriors of the fallen. Though they can't learn magic they gain levels and traits as champions.
Sions are your most skilled warriors, ascended from flesh. Though they can't learn magic they gain levels and traits like champions.
UnitType.Backstory: Your sions gain levels like champions. But they cannot cast spells, and die permanently upon falling in battle.
